short_summary: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Buyandsell posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by September 27, 2022 by 2:00PM MDT. All bids submitted after 2:00PM MDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. Fencing Maintenance Standing Offer .The Department of National Defence ( DND), has a requirement for the supply of all labour, material, contracts for an "as required" basis at multiple CFB Suffield sites including BATUS, various infrastructures at the village of Ralston, Alberta, utility and natural gas field locations, and other DND occupied facilities in Southern Alberta. The Standing Offer will be issued for a term of one(1) year with two(2) irrevocable one-year option years. It is anticipated that only 1 firm will be issued a standing offer.
